sentences.en: Also has some vegetables like carrot is not suitable eats uncooked.
sentences.cn: 还有一些蔬菜如胡萝卜是不宜生吃的.

sentences.en: Always wash your hands after handling uncooked meat.
sentences.cn: 碰过生肉后一定要洗手。

sentences.en: And It'suits seasoning uncooked vegetables and confecting roast food.
sentences.cn: 适合纯生菜调味及烤制食品配制,直接食用口味更佳.

sentences.en: Curing does not destroy all the organisms known to infect uncooked meat.
sentences.cn: 腌制并不能破坏所有能够感染生肉的有机物.

sentences.en: Do you have any uncooked dumplings to take out?
sentences.cn: 你们有生的水饺可以外带 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't use pickled beetroot, but buy it uncooked and cook it yourself.
sentences.cn: 不要买腌制的甜菜根，买生的来自己煮。

sentences.en: Eat plenty of uncooked fruit and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 要多吃新鲜水果和生蔬菜。

sentences.en: For the recipe you need 4 tablespoons of coral, preferably uncooked.
sentences.cn: 食谱里需要四汤勺龙虾卵, 最好是生的.

sentences.en: Ground beef and Stew Meat Allow 1  2 pound ( uncooked ) per serving.
sentences.cn: 碎牛肉和炖肉每份食物为l\2磅 ( 未烹调的 ).

sentences.en: Ground Beef and Stew Meat Allow 12 pound ( uncooked ) per serving.
sentences.cn: 碎牛肉和炖肉每份食物为l2磅 ( 未烹调的 ).

sentences.en: People eat uncooked carrots alone or with other vegetables.
sentences.cn: 可以单独生吃,也可以与其他蔬菜一道食用.

sentences.en: Scatter the uncooked turnip pieces over the spinach, then scatter the leeks.
sentences.cn: 把切好的生甘蓝片放到菠菜上, 然后撒上青蒜.

sentences.en: The fish is served au naturel, uncooked and with nothing added.
sentences.cn: 这条鱼是生吃的，未经蒸煮，也没加任何调味品。

sentences.en: The uncooked pressed bean curd slices are delicious in sauce.
Uncooked cabbage, cut thinly, is used in cole slaw and other salads.
sentences.cn: 生卷心菜, 切成薄片, 可以用来做甘蓝沙拉或其他的沙拉.

trans.tran_en: food that is uncooked has not been cooked
